Primary Energy: Negative 6 (planting compulsion in multiple minds) Supporting Energy: Space 8 (medium range/ 4 targets + Duration 4 hours) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (up to 4 creatures) Duration: 4 hours (or until completed) Total Cost: 14 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Up to 12 creatures you can see at medium range make Will saves. Compare your weaving successes to each target's save successes. Those you beat follow your suggested course of activity (1-2 sentences) that sounds reasonable. Targets pursue activity for 4 hours or until completing it. Obviously harmful suggestions end weave for that target. Creatures immune to charm are immune. Saving Throw: Will Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 hour, 2 = full effect (4 hours), 3 = 12 hours, 4 = requires 2 successes to recover (12 hours), 5 = requires 2 successes to recover (1 day)
